entity.description:
The entity that this contract is associated with. Currently, we only support Dataset contracts, but
in the future we may also support Data Product level contracts.

schema.description: An optional set of schema contracts. If this is a dataset contract, there will only be one.

freshness.description: An optional set of FRESHNESS contracts. If this is a dataset contract, there will only be one.

dataQuality.description: An optional set of Data Quality contracts, e.g. table and column level contract constraints.

assertion.description: The assertion representing the schema contract.

FreshnessContract.description: A contract pertaining to the operational SLAs of a physical data asset

assertion.description: The assertion representing the SLA contract.

DataQualityContract.description:
A data quality contract pertaining to a physical data asset
Data Quality contracts are used to make assertions about data quality metrics for a physical data asset

assertion.description:
The assertion representing the Data Quality contract.
E.g. a table or column-level assertion.
